questions.text: What are Ruth's moving essentials?
questions.answer: Her rock, eraser, keychain, baseball card, and pig collection

questions.text: What character prophesied the Japanese invasion of Southern China?
What does Ruth do wrong at her first big family dinner?
questions.answer: She serves herself first, before her elders

questions.text: What is the name of Bonnie's dog?
What kind of shirt does the cute guy in her school wear?
What food does Ruth love at family dim sum?
What does the family fight over at dim sum?
How is Ruth's father fed when his family runs out of milk?
questions.answer: He is fed ground up rice and water

questions.text: What does Ruth's mother give her to promote her brain health?
What does Ruth do to feel "less weird" in Hong Kong?
What does Ruth eat to be respectful to her grandmother?
What does Ruth nickname Marcus?
What do Ruth and Claudia have to chew up and spit into a petri dish?
What kind of tree does Angie have in her backyard?
What language is Ruth studying in school?
What character does it show Ruth painting when she is remembering her old school?
What kind of potato chips does Ruth get in her care package?
What movie does someone tell Ruth that they wish they could watch together?
What kind of candy bar does Matt tell Ruth to dip in melted marshmallow?
What are Ruth and her family celebrating at the end of the book?
do two characters have a "talk-to-talk" before bed?
must a family live in a barn for several months?
does a character eat a "weirdly good" tuna sandwich for lunch?
is someone introduced to the "Big 4" pop stars?
does a man scare away bandits while sick with fever?
does someone struggle to understand what a "wave-cut platform" is?
is a character taught to dip a Mars Bar in melted marshmallow?
does someone bring Kentucky Fried Chicken for dinner?
does someone stomp in clogs?
does someone visit a mall called Pacific Place?
is someone excited for a new Jackie Chan movie?
are there dogs named Fifi and Hannibal?
